description.value:
Wondrous item, uncommon
This fluted silver tube, barely two inches long, bears tiny runes etched between the grooves. While holding this tube, you can use an action to cast the @UUID[Compendium.black-flag.spells.Item.RBoSYpr3alIlLBro]{magic missile} spell from it. Once used, the tube can’t be used to cast @UUID[Compendium.black-flag.spells.Item.RBoSYpr3alIlLBro]{magic missile} again until 12 hours have passed.
